home.intro: As a future full-stack engineer, I’m interested in building robust and secure web applications.

about.text: Currently in my final year at ESIGELEC, I specialize in full-stack web development and cybersecurity. I’ve gained solid experience through hands-on team projects, such as Holo’Reed and my internship at ATIM, both of which are showcased in the Projects section. I’m passionate about modern technologies, creating efficient interfaces, and building code that makes a real-world impact.

piano.title: Piano Roll Generator
piano.description: An app that converts audio files into a playable piano roll video.

atim.title: ATIM Web App
atim.description: Web tool to estimate the battery life of IoT sensors. Includes a static version and one connected to an API.

holoreed.title: HoloReed
holoreed.description: A student project combining a web platform and a mixed reality headset to help doctors monitor patients with Parkinson’s disease and deliver personalized exercises.
